form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION TO FILE PETITION FOR NATURALIZATION, N-400 ( (Rev. 5-3-83) N

full_text: UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE OMB NO. 1115-0009 IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE Approval Expires 1/31/84 FEE STAMP APPLICATION TO FILE PETITION FOR NATURALIZATION Mail or take to: DEC 2. IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE ALIEN REGISTRATION (See INSTRUCTIONS. BE SURE YOU UNDERSTAND EACH Show the exact spelling of your name as it appears on your alien registration receipt card, and the number of your card. If you did not register, so state.) QUESTION BEFORE YOU ANSWER IT. PLEASE PRINT OR Name QUINTANA-SANCHEZ TYPE.) No. 340 38282 Section of Law 316(a) Date: December 11, 1984 (Leave Blank) (1) My full true and correct name is Juan Quintana Sanchez (Full true name without abbreviations) (2) I now live at: P.O. Box 312 (Number and street, Ignacio , Colorado 8 1137 City county, state, zip code) (3) I was born on June 25, 1913 in Cerritos Tepehuanes, Durango Mexico (Month) (Day) (Year) (City or town) (County, province, or state) (Country) (4) I request that my name be changed to None (5) Other names I have used are: None (Include maiden name) Sex: Male Female (6) Was your father or mother ever a United States citizen? Yes No (If "Yes", explain fully) (7) Can you read and write English? Alittle Xes No (8) Can you speak English? (9) Can you sign your name in English? SAULI.551 Yes No Yes No (10) My lawful admission for permanent residence was on September 8 1972 under the name of Sanchez-Quintana, Juan (Month) San Ysidro, Day) California Year) at (City) (State) (11) (a) I have resided continuously in the United States since Sept. 8 1972 (b) I have resided continuously in the State of Colorado (Month) (Day) (Year) since June a 1978 (Month) (Day) (Year) (e) During the last five years I have been physically in the United States for a total of 60 months. (12) Do you intend to reside permanently in the United States? Yes No If "No," explain: (13) In what places in the United States have you lived during the last 5 years? List present address FIRST. FROM To STREET ADDRESS CITY AND STATE (a) 6 19.78 PRESENT TIME P.O. Box 312 Ignacio, Colorado (b) 19 19 (c) 19 19 (d) 19 19 (14) (a) Have you been out of the United States since your lawful admission as a permanent resident? Yes No If "Yes" fill in the following information for every absence of less than 6 months, no matter how short it was. NAME OF SHIP. OR OF AIRLINE, RAILROAD COMPANY, Bus DATE DEPARTED DATE RETURNED COMPANY, OR OTHER MEANS USED TO RETURN TO THE PLACE OR PORT OF ENTRY THROUGH WHICH You UNITED STATES RETURNED TO THE UNITED STATES 6/12/84 6/24/84 By Truck E1 Paso, Texas go to Mexico for 15 days every year (b) Since your lawful admission, have you been out of the United States for a period of 6 months or longer? Yes No If "No", state "None"; If "Yes", fill in following information for every absence of more than 6 months. NAME OF SHIP OR OF AIRLINE, RAILROAD COMPANY, BUS DATE DEPARTED DATE RETURNED COMPANY, OR OTHER MEANS USED TO RETURN TO THE PLACE OR PORT OF ENTRY THROUGH WHICH You UNITED STATES NONE RETURNED TO THE UNITED STATES Form N-400 (Rev. 5-5-83) N (OVER) (1)
